posts.content:
The EDR III Caster (Sorcerer 38 / Paladin 1 / Fighter 1)

This is a divinely simple build draft design.

Sorcerer 38 for great spell power
Paladin 1 for great saves, disease immunity, proficiencies
Fighter 1 to help get EDR III

Essentially this hybrid character has two modes:
- Tanky sorceress who can sling DC spells with a base Cha of 32 (cap-able at 44) -> full battle power wearing robes, this is a very forgiving DC caster with base 400+ HP, perfect for someone new to arcane spell casting
- Tanky meleer with Full Plate/Large Shield who can spell cast with wands and scrolls during combat, tanking for your summons to do damage, or your party to do damage [Knockdown Immunity will be essential to do this] -> full tank power

Doing both would have been possible with Auto-Still III, however I felt it was too ambitious to have DC casting, EDR III and Auto-Still III all together, compromises would have had to have been made.
In the environment I play in, enough -arcane spell failure socket-able equipment is available to make Auto-Still III obsolete.

Defensive stats:
- 414hp (654hp capped), 
- Fort 34 Will 31 Reflex 26 with +8 vs spells, 
- Simple/Martial Weapon Proficiency, Shield Proficiency, Light/Medium/Heavy Armor Proficiency
- +3 AC from Tumble 15, Epic Mage Armor, Epic Warding, spells (ie. Improved Invis, Premonition, Shadow Shield)
- Disease Immunity, able to use Fighter / Paladin only equipment

Spells with capped Cha 44: 

7 11 10 10 10 10 9 9 9 9

or 94 spells / day (7 cantrips) with spell penetration 38 +1d20

Spoiler Level 1 (5):  [Summon Creature I, Endure Elements, Identify, Shelgarn's Persistent Blade] Level 2 (5):  [Ghostly Visage, Invisibility, Summon Creature II] Level 3 (4):  [Fireball, Find Traps, Summon Creature III] Level 4 (4):  [Summon Creature IV] Level 5 (4):  [Animate Dead, Summon Creature V] Level 6 (3):  [Greater Stoneskin, Undeath to Death, Summon Creature VI] Level 7 (3):  [Summon Creature VII] Level 8 (3):  [Summon Creature VIII] Level 9 (3): 
Spoiler Level 9 - Wail of the Banshee, Maximized IGMS, Silent Horrid Wilting Level 7 - Finger of Death, Silent IGMS, Empowered Firebrand, Maximized Ice Storm Level 5 - Firebrand, Mestil's/Cloudkill, Silent ILMS, Silent Ice Storm, Empowered Flame Arrow Level 3 - Flame Arrow, Stinking Cloud, Empowered Magic Missile, Silent Darkness Level 1 - Magic Missile, Grease

I have searched the ECB Archives and ECB Filter Search by DPA 
There is only one build with Sorc 35+ / Paladin / Fighter, Duke Nukem (Sorc 35/Fighter 4/Paladin 1), 
It is a 430hp dual ESF evocation/necromancy & damage shield focused caster with Base Cha 30, very much inspired by Grizzled_Dwarflord's Mestil's Pale Emissary at the time. 

In comparison I choose to have more caster levels, base Cha 32 for the optimal level 9 spells / day with Cha capped (appreciate Yunim teaching me this) and to focus less on damage shields (although such a strategy is possible with Mestil's Acid Sheath / Shapechange-Iron Golem). Craft Wand/Scribe Scroll for spell casting in full plate. 
Skills are different (I value Spot and Search, for example), EDR III is obtained earlier (level 27), and I obtain Epic Mage Armor while Duke Nukem doesn't.

Anyway this one looked quite good so I have posted this one up, delighted to hear any comments / suggestions
Normally I would say devilishly simple, but in this case, divinely simple.

posts.content:
I have one similar.  Didnt gimp the str as badly though and if I recall I took 2 pally levels for the Fear Immunity.  And I think i took 3 ftr levels to make grabbing the EDR feats easier feat wise.

I'd have to pull up the build when I get home, but that's the major highlights I recall.  When I check if she is substantially different i'll post her too.

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Hi Conlaoch
They say great minds think alike.
In this case I initially thought as you did I did attempt a Sorc 36 / Paladin 2 / Fighter 2 split at the beginning for the extra fighter bonus feat + fear immunity
But then I figured Sorc 38 / Fighter 1 / Paladin 1 wouldn't lose any feats overall as sorc 38 gets a bonus feat, and I can swap things around for EDR to be on a general epic feat and one great cha to a bonus sorc feat. 2 extra caster levels compensates for the loss of fear immunity, 1 fort save, a little HP and 1 BAB. So I chose this split instead.
I did want more Str in the build to carry things and help equip armor but the skill points were unfortunately needed (spot + search) in my opinion, sneakers and traps are one way this sorceress dies in my opinion and I didn't want to totally dump those

That reminds me, I should put True Seeing somewhere in my spellbook... I'll edit it when I get the chance.
